question: Undecended testicle (i'm 16)?
question_content: Hello i'm 16 almost 17 and i have a undecended testical and i'm very scared.. I'm already going to the doctors to tell him about it in a couple weeks..The testical is not that far up.. i can feel it in the scrotum like the tip of it. but it is ALOT smaller than my other one.. I'm so scared because i wanna have kids. The risk of cancer does not scare me as much a infertility.. Can you guys tell me what i should do do you know if i'm fertal and is it good that i cna feel it through the scrotom and why is it so small is that bad.. thank you so much

answers.answer_content: You do not need 2 testicles to have children. My uncle lost one due to VD when he was in the service, didn't take care of the infection quick enough. He had 4 boys. Don't worry you will be fine.
